long.ar:
This extension offers a range of features to help you navigate different languages online. It allows you to effortlessly translate web pages, highlighted text, Netflix subtitles, and private messages. You can also have the text read aloud and save important translations to your personal dictionary for learning.

Translator for Chrome best and easiest way to quickly translate part of the content that you need, such as words, phrases, or even menu items. 

Translate words and phrases while browsing the web, using Google Translate. Translate while you read and write with Quick Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them. 

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Highlight the word or text you want to translate and you will immediately see the translation into your language. All in one simple and understandable browser extension. 

➖ Completely free. Doesn't require registration or any subscriptions;
➖ Supports over 120 languages;
➖ Automatic language detection;
➖ Text voice acting for 60 languages; 
➖ Reverse translation; 
➖ Works on all sites including Gmail, Facebook, Twitter and others;
➖ Convenient and intuitive user interface of the extension;
➖ Translating words using a dictionary (+ dictionary works offline).

Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.

translator reads and reproduces words, phrases and entire texts using quality human text-to-speech (TTS) translation. It shows transcription and transliteration, also knows how to reproduce words or texts with the correct accent and with correct stress. Learn the correct pronunciation words right away, without postponing it for later!

translator functionality:
✔️ Web page translation - full web page translation with mouse hover translation
✔️ dictionary  -  Word meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, hypernyms, hyponyms and more.
✔️ bookmarks  - Keeps track of all the changes you made to your bookmarks. Saving translation history.
✔️ text to speech - Hear correct pronunciation and play words and texts with correct accent.
✔️ image translation (image recognition) - Just select the area on the monitor that you want to translate (the principle of work is as in the screenshot tool).

In the new version of the extension, we have added the ability to select translators. Now you do not need to install additional programs or applications to use Google Translate, all in one convenient extension, with all the features that are available for the uLanguage translator.

Text-to-speech 
Use TTS function that helps you learn how words sound as well as phonetic transcription.

Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

Translate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world.

• Text translator: Get free translation for text in over 100 languages.
• Translate text to speech: Listen to translation in male or female voices.
• Switch between different dialects when you translate.
• Dictionary & Thesaurus for all languages.
• Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more.
• Photo translator: With Translator, you can use your camera to translate menus, signs, and more instantly.
• Offline translation: Translate in over 40 Languages without an Internet connection.
• Voice translator: Translate Voice-to-Voice conversation and speech.
• Verb conjugations in different tenses.
Just choose which translator you want to use today: uLanguage translate or Google translate.

Use the translator for your travel journeys in 2023:
- translate text and voice in seconds
- translate question for local people,
- translate conversation in shops,
- translate signs and pointers.

With the Google Translate extension, you can go beyond simple translations. Transform the way you interact with online content by using this tool to aid in language learning. Yes, that's right! Google Translate can serve as a handy language learning companion. By using it as a dictionary for new words and phrases you encounter on the web, you can gradually improve your language proficiency. Each word or sentence translated becomes a new learning opportunity.

Google Translate's proficiency isn't limited to one type of content. Whether it's news articles, social media posts, e-books, or academic journals, the tool provides reliable translations across different types of content. This page translator opens up a world of knowledge that was once beyond reach due to language limitations.

Additionally, the Google Translate extension features a user-friendly interface. This design emphasizes simplicity and ease of use, ensuring that even first-time users can easily navigate the extension. No need to juggle multiple windows or tabs—your translation appears right on the webpage you're viewing, providing a smooth and uninterrupted browsing experience.

And for those of you who find yourselves frequently translating between specific languages, Google Translate allows you to customize your settings to favor those languages. This personalized touch not only saves you time but also makes your translation process more efficient.

Not to forget, Google Translate’s seamless integration into your browser offers an always-available solution, whether you're reading, researching, or just casually browsing. You no longer need to disrupt your browsing flow to access reliable translation services.

Lastly, but importantly, Google Translate is committed to user privacy. Rest assured, your translations remain private, and no data from the content you translate is used to target ads.

By incorporating Google Translate into your browsing experience, you're embracing an extension that is much more than just an online translator. It's a dictionary, a multi languages translator, an accurate translate tool, and above all, it's your bridge to understanding and interacting with the limitless content on the web.

All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.


Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.

Microsoft Translator is a free, personal translation app for more than 70 languages, to translate text, voice, conversations, camera photos and screenshots. You can also download languages for offline translation for free to use when you travel.

• Text translation into over 70 languages*, for online and offline use
• Camera translation to translate text within photos and screenshots
• Voice translation to translate speech, and a split-screen mode for two participants having a bilingual conversation
• Multi-person conversation translation - connect your devices and have in-person conversations with up to 100 people across multiple languages
• Phrasebooks for verified translations and pronunciation guides to help you learn important phrases in foreign languages when you travel
• Look up alternate translations and meanings of a word to find the best translation to express yourself
• Download languages for offline use for when you travel without an internet connection
• Hear your translated phrase out loud to help you learn how to say the translation
• View transliterations (pronunciation guides) to help you pronounce the translation (includes Pinyin support for Chinese)
• Share your translations with other apps
• Pin and save your most frequent translations for later
• Translate text in other apps through context menu translation

• Text translation: Translate between 108 languages by typing
• Tap to Translate: Copy text in any app and tap the Google Translate icon to translate (all languages)
• Offline: Translate with no internet connection (59 languages)
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera (94 languages)
• Photos: Take or import photos for higher quality translations (90 languages)
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly (70 languages)
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing (96 languages)
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference (all languages)
• Cross-device syncing: Login to sync phrasebook between app and desktop
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time (8 languages)

long.bg:
This extension offers a range of features to help you navigate different languages online. It allows you to effortlessly translate web pages, highlighted text, Netflix subtitles, and private messages. You can also have the text read aloud and save important translations to your personal dictionary for learning.

Encountering unfamiliar words while reading an online article? No problem! Simply select the text you want to translate, and with a click of a button, you'll get the translation. You can also speak the translated text and save it directly to your dictionary.

Translator for Chrome best and easiest way to quickly translate part of the content that you need, such as words, phrases, or even menu items. 

Translate words and phrases while browsing the web, using Google Translate. Translate while you read and write with Quick Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them. 

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Highlight the word or text you want to translate and you will immediately see the translation into your language. All in one simple and understandable browser extension. 

➖ Completely free. Doesn't require registration or any subscriptions;
➖ Supports over 120 languages;
➖ Automatic language detection;
➖ Text voice acting for 60 languages; 
➖ Reverse translation; 
➖ Works on all sites including Gmail, Facebook, Twitter and others;
➖ Convenient and intuitive user interface of the extension;
➖ Translating words using a dictionary (+ dictionary works offline).

Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.

translator reads and reproduces words, phrases and entire texts using quality human text-to-speech (TTS) translation. It shows transcription and transliteration, also knows how to reproduce words or texts with the correct accent and with correct stress. Learn the correct pronunciation words right away, without postponing it for later!

translator functionality:
✔️ Web page translation - full web page translation with mouse hover translation
✔️ dictionary  -  Word meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, hypernyms, hyponyms and more.
✔️ bookmarks  - Keeps track of all the changes you made to your bookmarks. Saving translation history.
✔️ text to speech - Hear correct pronunciation and play words and texts with correct accent.
✔️ image translation (image recognition) - Just select the area on the monitor that you want to translate (the principle of work is as in the screenshot tool).

In the new version of the extension, we have added the ability to select translators. Now you do not need to install additional programs or applications to use Google Translate, all in one convenient extension, with all the features that are available for the uLanguage translator.

Text-to-speech 
Use TTS function that helps you learn how words sound as well as phonetic transcription.

Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

Translate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world.

• Text translator: Get free translation for text in over 100 languages.
• Translate text to speech: Listen to translation in male or female voices.
• Switch between different dialects when you translate.
• Dictionary & Thesaurus for all languages.
• Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more.
• Photo translator: With Translator, you can use your camera to translate menus, signs, and more instantly.
• Offline translation: Translate in over 40 Languages without an Internet connection.
• Voice translator: Translate Voice-to-Voice conversation and speech.
• Verb conjugations in different tenses.
Just choose which translator you want to use today: uLanguage translate or Google translate.

Use the translator for your travel journeys in 2023:
- translate text and voice in seconds
- translate question for local people,
- translate conversation in shops,
- translate signs and pointers.

With the Google Translate extension, you can go beyond simple translations. Transform the way you interact with online content by using this tool to aid in language learning. Yes, that's right! Google Translate can serve as a handy language learning companion. By using it as a dictionary for new words and phrases you encounter on the web, you can gradually improve your language proficiency. Each word or sentence translated becomes a new learning opportunity.

Google Translate's proficiency isn't limited to one type of content. Whether it's news articles, social media posts, e-books, or academic journals, the tool provides reliable translations across different types of content. This page translator opens up a world of knowledge that was once beyond reach due to language limitations.

Additionally, the Google Translate extension features a user-friendly interface. This design emphasizes simplicity and ease of use, ensuring that even first-time users can easily navigate the extension. No need to juggle multiple windows or tabs—your translation appears right on the webpage you're viewing, providing a smooth and uninterrupted browsing experience.

And for those of you who find yourselves frequently translating between specific languages, Google Translate allows you to customize your settings to favor those languages. This personalized touch not only saves you time but also makes your translation process more efficient.

Not to forget, Google Translate’s seamless integration into your browser offers an always-available solution, whether you're reading, researching, or just casually browsing. You no longer need to disrupt your browsing flow to access reliable translation services.

Lastly, but importantly, Google Translate is committed to user privacy. Rest assured, your translations remain private, and no data from the content you translate is used to target ads.

By incorporating Google Translate into your browsing experience, you're embracing an extension that is much more than just an online translator. It's a dictionary, a multi languages translator, an accurate translate tool, and above all, it's your bridge to understanding and interacting with the limitless content on the web.

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Highlight the word or text you want to translate and you will immediately see the translation into your language. All in one simple and understandable browser extension. 

Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Google Translate one of the most popular online translation services is offered by Google. And if you search Google for translators, its own handy translation website will pop right up above your search results. This means you do not have to open another website.

But if you have a lengthy amount of text to translate, the Google Translate website is your spot. You have more space for your text and can choose your input method from handwriting or keyboard options. Other features you might like are saving, listening to, sharing, or copying the translated text.

In addition, you can suggest an edit if you believe the translation is incorrect. Google Translate provides over 100 languages.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

After you receive the translation, you have options to hear it aloud in a male or female voice, share it, or search Bing with it. Moreover, you can also give the translation a thumbs-up or thumbs-down if you would like to provide a little feedback. The free translator offers over 60 languages, which makes it a perfect bargain in our opinion.

long.ca:
Aquesta extensió ofereix una sèrie de funcions per ajudar-vos a navegar per diferents idiomes en línia. Us permet traduir sense esforç pàgines web, text destacat, subtítols de Netflix i missatges privats. També podeu fer llegir el text en veu alta i desar traduccions importants al vostre diccionari personal per aprendre.

Trobeu paraules desconegudes mentre llegiu un article en línia? Cap problema! Simplement seleccioneu el text que voleu traduir i amb un clic d'un botó obtindreu la traducció. També podeu parlar el text traduït i desar-lo directament al diccionari.

Per a l'entrada de text i la traducció, només cal que feu clic al botó d'extensió per obrir una finestra emergent. El bonic disseny de l'extensió fa que sigui fàcil d'utilitzar, cosa que us permet explorar la seva funcionalitat i triar el vostre tema de color preferit.

Traductor per a Chrome, la millor i més senzilla manera de traduir ràpidament part del contingut que necessiteu, com ara paraules, frases o fins i tot elements de menú.

Tradueix paraules i frases mentre navegues per la web amb Google Translate. Tradueix mentre llegeixes i escrius amb Quick Translate, el traductor més precís del món.

Amb aquest traductor, podeu gaudir d'una qualitat de traducció immillorable de Google Translate sense sortir del vostre navegador.

Tradueix mentre llegeix
Aprèn un idioma llegint el que vulguis. Tradueix paraules i frases en directe a qualsevol pàgina web. Feu clic a paraules o frases de qualsevol lloc per traduir-les.

Baixeu Quick Translate per a Chrome gratuïtament per començar a traduir avui mateix.

Ressalteu la paraula o el text que voleu traduir i immediatament veureu la traducció al vostre idioma. Tot en una extensió de navegador senzilla i entenedora.

➖ Completament gratuït. No requereix registre ni cap subscripció;
➖ Admet més de 120 idiomes;
➖ Detecció automàtica de l'idioma;
➖ Actuació de veu de text per a 60 idiomes;
➖ Traducció inversa;
➖ Funciona a tots els llocs, inclosos Gmail, Facebook, Twitter i altres;
➖ Interfície d'usuari còmoda i intuïtiva de l'extensió;
➖ Traduir paraules mitjançant un diccionari (+ el diccionari funciona fora de línia).

Tradueix el teu escrit
Amb el traductor, podeu escriure el vostre contingut a la part superior de la finestra emergent i obtenir la traducció a la part inferior. Totes les traduccions (com ara el francès, l'alemany, l'espanyol, l'àrab i noranta-set idiomes més) estan impulsades per traduccions automàtices neuronals de Google Translate que tradueixen amb precisió el vostre contingut.

el traductor llegeix i reprodueix paraules, frases i textos sencers mitjançant una traducció de text a veu (TTS) humana de qualitat. Mostra transcripció i transliteració, també sap reproduir paraules o textos amb l'accent correcte i amb l'accent correcte. Apreneu les paraules de pronunciació correctes de seguida, sense posposar-ho per a més endavant!

funcionalitat del traductor:
✔️ Traducció de pàgines web: traducció completa de pàgines web amb traducció amb el ratolí
✔️ diccionari: significat de paraules, pronunciació, sinònims, hipernims, hipònims i molt més.
✔️ adreces d'interès: fa un seguiment de tots els canvis que heu fet als vostres marcadors. S'està desant l'historial de traduccions.
✔️ text a veu - Escolteu la pronunciació correcta i reproduïu paraules i textos amb l'accent correcte.
✔️ Traducció d'imatges (reconeixement d'imatges): només cal que seleccioneu l'àrea del monitor que voleu traduir (el principi de treball és com a l'eina de captura de pantalla).

A la nova versió de l'extensió, hem afegit la possibilitat de seleccionar traductors. Ara no cal que instal·leu programes o aplicacions addicionals per utilitzar Google Translate, tot en una còmoda extensió, amb totes les funcions disponibles per al traductor uLanguage.

Text a veu
Utilitzeu la funció TTS que us ajuda a aprendre com sonen les paraules i la transcripció fonètica.

Traduccions a pàgina sencera
Tradueix pàgines web senceres a l'idioma desitjat amb només un clic. Aquesta és una nova funció proporcionada per Google Translator de forma gratuïta que hem integrat al nostre traductor.

Bing Translator, un altre gran nom dels llocs web de traducció en línia gratuïta és Bing, que utilitza Microsoft Translator. Podeu seleccionar l'idioma d'entrada o fer que el lloc el detecti automàticament mentre escriviu. Si tens el micròfon activat, pots pronunciar el text que vols traduir, cosa que sembla molt convenient si ens ho demanes.

Translate Translator permet als viatgers, estudiants, professionals de negocis, empresaris i personal mèdic llegir, escriure i parlar en els idiomes desitjats i traduir a qualsevol part del món.

• Traductor de text: obteniu traduccions gratuïtes de text en més de 100 idiomes.
• Traduir text a veu: Escolteu la traducció amb veu masculina o femenina.
• Canvia entre diferents dialectes quan tradueixis.
• Diccionari i tesaurus per a tots els idiomes.
• Transliteració, Compartició, Preferits, Història i molt més.
• Traductor de fotos: amb Translator, podeu utilitzar la vostra càmera per traduir menús, rètols i més a l'instant.
• Traducció fora de línia: tradueix en més de 40 idiomes sense connexió a Internet.
• Traductor de veu: tradueix converses i veu de veu a veu.
• Conjugacions verbals en diferents temps.
Només has de triar quin traductor vols utilitzar avui: uLanguage translate o Google Translate.

Utilitzeu el traductor per als vostres viatges el 2023:
- traduir text i veu en segons
- Traduir la pregunta per a la gent local,
- traduir la conversa a les botigues,
- traduir signes i indicadors.

Microsoft Translator és una aplicació de traducció personal gratuïta per a més de 70 idiomes, per traduir text, veu, converses, fotos de càmera i captures de pantalla. També podeu descarregar idiomes per a la traducció fora de línia de manera gratuïta per utilitzar-los quan viatgeu.
long.cs:
Toto rozšíření nabízí řadu funkcí, které vám pomohou procházet různé jazyky online. Umožňuje vám bez námahy překládat webové stránky, zvýrazněný text, titulky Netflix a soukromé zprávy. Můžete si také nechat text přečíst nahlas a uložit si důležité překlady do svého osobního slovníku pro učení.

Setkáváte se při čtení online článku s neznámými slovy? Žádný problém! Jednoduše vyberte text, který chcete přeložit, a kliknutím na tlačítko získáte překlad. Přeložený text můžete také vyslovit a uložit přímo do svého slovníku.

Pro zadávání textu a překlad stačí kliknout na tlačítko rozšíření a otevřít vyskakovací okno. Krásný design rozšíření usnadňuje použití, umožňuje vám prozkoumat jeho funkčnost a vybrat si preferovaný barevný motiv.

Překladač pro Chrome nejlepší a nejjednodušší způsob, jak rychle přeložit část obsahu, který potřebujete, jako jsou slova, fráze nebo dokonce položky nabídky.

Překládejte slova a fráze při procházení webu pomocí Překladače Google. Překládejte při čtení a psaní pomocí rychlého překladu, nejpřesnějšího překladače na světě.

S tímto překladačem si můžete užívat nepřekonatelnou kvalitu překladu Google Translate, aniž byste museli opustit prohlížeč.

Překládejte při čtení
Naučte se jazyk čtením, co chcete. Překládejte slova a fráze živě na jakékoli webové stránce. Klikněte na slova nebo fráze na libovolném webu a přeložte je.

Stáhněte si zdarma Rychlý překlad pro Chrome a začněte překládat ještě dnes.

Zvýrazněte slovo nebo text, který chcete přeložit, a okamžitě uvidíte překlad do vašeho jazyka. Vše v jednom jednoduchém a srozumitelném rozšíření prohlížeče.

➖ Zcela zdarma. Nevyžaduje registraci ani žádné předplatné;
➖ Podporuje více než 120 jazyků;
➖ Automatická detekce jazyka;
➖ Textové hlasové ovládání pro 60 jazyků;
➖ Reverzní překlad;
➖ Funguje na všech stránkách včetně Gmailu, Facebooku, Twitteru a dalších;
➖ Pohodlné a intuitivní uživatelské rozhraní rozšíření;
➖ Překlad slov pomocí slovníku (+ slovník funguje offline).

Přeložte své psaní
Pomocí překladače můžete napsat svůj obsah v horní části vyskakovacího okna a překlad zobrazit ve spodní části. Všechny překlady (např. francouzština, němčina, španělština, arabština a devadesát sedm dalších jazyků) jsou založeny na neuronových strojových překladech od Překladače Google, který přesně přeloží váš obsah.

překladač čte a reprodukuje slova, fráze a celé texty pomocí kvalitního překladu lidského textu na řeč (TTS). Ukazuje transkripci a transliteraci, také ví, jak reprodukovat slova nebo texty se správným přízvukem a se správným důrazem. Naučte se správná slova výslovnosti ihned, aniž byste to odkládali na později!

funkce překladače:
✔️ Překlad webových stránek - úplný překlad webových stránek s překladem po najetí myší
✔️ slovník - význam slov, výslovnost, synonyma, hypernyma, hyponyma a další.
✔️ záložky - Sleduje všechny změny, které jste provedli ve svých záložkách. Ukládání historie překladů.
✔️ převod textu na řeč - Poslouchejte správnou výslovnost a hrajte slova a texty se správným přízvukem.
✔️ překlad obrázků (rozpoznávání obrázků) - Stačí vybrat oblast na monitoru, kterou chcete přeložit (princip práce je jako v nástroji pro snímání obrazovky).

V nové verzi rozšíření jsme přidali možnost výběru překladatelů. Nyní již nemusíte instalovat další programy nebo aplikace, abyste mohli používat Překladač Google, vše v jednom praktickém rozšíření se všemi funkcemi, které jsou dostupné pro překladač uLanguage.

Text na řeč
Použijte funkci TTS, která vám pomůže naučit se, jak slova zní, a také fonetický přepis.

Celostránkové překlady
Přeložte celé webové stránky do požadovaného jazyka jediným kliknutím. Toto je nová funkce, kterou Google Translator poskytuje zdarma a kterou jsme integrovali do našeho překladače.

Bing Translator Dalším velkým jménem na bezplatných online překladových webech je Bing, který používá Microsoft Translator. Můžete si vybrat jazyk zadávání nebo nechat web automaticky detekovat, když píšete. Pokud máte zapnutý mikrofon, můžete vyslovit text, který chcete přeložit, což se zdá být docela pohodlné, pokud se nás zeptáte.

Translate Translator umožňuje cestovatelům, studentům, obchodníkům, zaměstnavatelům a lékařskému personálu číst, psát a mluvit v požadovaných jazycích a překládat kdekoli na světě.

• Textový překladač: Získejte bezplatný překlad textu ve více než 100 jazycích.
• Překlad textu na řeč: Poslouchejte překlad mužskými nebo ženskými hlasy.
• Při překladu přepínejte mezi různými dialekty.
• Slovník a tezaurus pro všechny jazyky.
• Přepis, Sdílení, Oblíbené, Historie a mnoho dalšího.
• Překladač fotografií: Pomocí Překladače můžete okamžitě překládat nabídky, nápisy a další.
• Offline překlad: Překládejte do více než 40 jazyků bez připojení k internetu.
• Hlasový překladač: Překládejte konverzaci a řeč Voice-to-Voice.
• Konjugace sloves v různých časech.
Stačí si vybrat, který překladač chcete dnes používat: uLanguage translate nebo Google translate.

Použijte překladač pro své cesty v roce 2023:
- přeložte text a hlas během několika sekund
- přeložit otázku pro místní lidi,
- překládat konverzaci v obchodech,
- překládat značky a ukazatele.

Microsoft translator je bezplatná osobní překladatelská aplikace pro více než 70 jazyků, která překládá text, hlas, konverzace, fotografie z fotoaparátu a snímky obrazovky. Můžete si také zdarma stáhnout jazyky pro offline překlad a používat je na cestách.

Best and easiest way to quickly translate part of the content that you need, such as words, phrases, or even menu items. 

Highlight the word or text you want to translate and you will immediately see the translation into your language. All in one simple and understandable browser extension. 

➖ Completely free. Doesn't require registration or any subscriptions;
➖ Supports over 120 languages;
➖ Automatic language detection;
➖ Text voice acting for 60 languages; 
➖ Reverse translation; 
➖ Works on all sites including Gmail, Facebook, Twitter and others;
➖ Convenient and intuitive user interface of the extension;
➖ Translating words using a dictionary (+ dictionary works offline).

Translator uLanguage reads and reproduces words, phrases and entire texts using quality human text-to-speech (TTS) translation. It shows transcription and transliteration, also knows how to reproduce words or texts with the correct accent and with correct stress. Learn the correct pronunciation words right away, without postponing it for later!

Functionality:

✔️ Web page Translation - full web page translation with mouse hover translation

✔️ Dictionary  -  Word meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, hypernyms, hyponyms and more.

✔️ Bookmarks  - Keeps track of all the changes you made to your bookmarks. Saving translation history.

✔️ Text to speech - Hear correct pronunciation and play words and texts with correct accent.

✔️ Image translation (image recognition) - Just select the area on the monitor that you want to translate (the principle of work is as in the screenshot tool).

Простой переводчик. Перевести выделенный текст с веб-сайтов.
Приложение Translate It переводит тексты, слова с любой веб-страницы на ваш язык. Удобный переводчик и словарь.

Переводчик и словарь - ПОЗВОЛЬТЕ ВЫБРАТЬ И ПЕРЕВОДИТЬ ФРАГМЕНТЫ ТЕКСТА
Как это работает?
1. Установите расширение Translator из Интернет-магазина Chrome.
2. Перейдите к документу или к странице, которую вы хотите перевести.
какой-то текст.
3. Выделите нужный текст и переведите его.
4. Получите свой перевод.

👉 Перевести слова и предложения
👉 Говорите и переводите текст
👉 Слушайте переведенный текст
👉 Легко копировать и вставлять текст
👉 Поделитесь переводом текста с друзьями
👉 Подробная история
👉 Простой и привлекательный пользовательский интерфейс
👉 Бесплатный переводчик с речью
👉 Бесплатный перевод на другой язык
👉 Совершенно бесплатно и быстрее
👉 Лучшее приложение для перевода слов
👉 Перевести более 100 языков
👉 Копируйте и удаляйте текст одним щелчком мыши с помощью переводчика

Голосовой переводчик:

Основная функция приложения для бесплатного языкового переводчика - голосовой переводчик.

Просто говорите и легко переводите все свои слова на выбранный язык. Говорите сразу и переводите несколько раз на разные языки. Нажмите и удерживайте кнопку голосового управления и произнесите слова, которые хотите перевести, и ваши слова будут легко переведены на нужный язык. Translate free - лучший языковой переводчик с помощью голосового приложения. Переведите текст с помощью этого переводчика или инструмента веб-перевода, переводчик для хром.

Перевести:
Переводчик всегда поможет разобрать иностранные тексты на любом сайте и даже в PDF-документах! Не беспокойтесь о незнакомых словах! Всего один щелчок - и языковой барьер преодолен. Выберите слово, и оно автоматически определит соответствующие выражения в вашем тексте. Выберите предложение или абзац и мгновенно получите его перевод на самой странице. Слушайте произношение и откройте для себя примеры использования из реальной жизни.

ВСТРОЕННЫЙ ПЕРЕВОДЧИК
Встроенный переводчик переводит выбранный текст предложение за предложением и вставляет перевод на веб-страницу с сохранением исходного форматирования.

КАК ЗАПУСТИТЬ Переводчик
  * нажмите кнопку «Переводчик» на панели инструментов Chrome.
  * воспользуйтесь контекстным меню «Переводчик», затем выберите предпочтительное приложение для перевода.

КАК ПЕРЕВЕСТИ ВЫБОР
Выделите текст и:
* нажмите кнопку «Расширение переводчика» на панели инструментов Chrome, чтобы запустить автономное приложение «Переводчик».
 * нажмите плавающую кнопку «Переводчик», чтобы запустить «Переводчик всплывающих пузырьков».
* воспользуйтесь контекстным меню «Переводчик», затем выберите «Встроенный переводчик».
long.da:
Denne udvidelse tilbyder en række funktioner, der hjælper dig med at navigere på forskellige sprog online. Det giver dig mulighed for ubesværet at oversætte websider, fremhævet tekst, Netflix-undertekster og private beskeder. Du kan også få teksten læst op og gemme vigtige oversættelser til din personlige ordbog til læring.

Støder du på ukendte ord, mens du læser en artikel på nettet? Intet problem! Du skal blot vælge den tekst, du vil oversætte, og med et klik på en knap får du oversættelsen. Du kan også læse den oversatte tekst og gemme den direkte i din ordbog.

For tekstinput og oversættelse skal du blot klikke på udvidelsesknappen for at åbne et pop op-vindue. Udvidelsens smukke design gør den nem at bruge, så du kan udforske dens funktionalitet og vælge dit foretrukne farvetema.

Oversætter til Chrome bedste og nemmeste måde at hurtigt oversætte en del af det indhold, du har brug for, såsom ord, sætninger eller endda menupunkter.

Oversæt ord og sætninger, mens du surfer på nettet, ved hjælp af Google Oversæt. Oversæt, mens du læser og skriver med Quick Translate, verdens mest nøjagtige oversætter.

Med denne oversætter kan du nyde Google translate uovertruffen oversættelseskvalitet uden at forlade din browser.

Oversæt, mens du læser
Lær et sprog ved at læse, hvad du kan lide. Oversæt ord og sætninger live på enhver webside. Klik på ord eller sætninger på ethvert websted for at oversætte dem.

Download Hurtig oversættelse til Chrome gratis for at begynde at oversætte i dag.

Fremhæv det ord eller den tekst, du vil oversætte, og du vil straks se oversættelsen til dit sprog. Alt sammen i én enkel og forståelig browserudvidelse.

➖ Helt gratis. Kræver ikke registrering eller nogen abonnementer;
➖ Understøtter over 120 sprog;
➖ Automatisk sprogdetektion;
➖ Tekst stemmeskuespil for 60 sprog;
➖ Omvendt oversættelse;
➖ Virker på alle websteder inklusive Gmail, Facebook, Twitter og andre;
➖ Praktisk og intuitiv brugergrænseflade af udvidelsen;

oversætteren læser og gengiver ord, sætninger og hele tekster ved hjælp af kvalitets human text-to-speech (TTS) oversættelse. Whether you’re writing a social media post, chat message, or email, you can translate your own words immediately after you type them. This means you no longer have to copy, paste, retype, or leave Chrome to communicate in another language.

Full-page translations
If you’re a DeepL Pro user, you can translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. To make things even easier, you can choose to have all websites in specific languages automatically translated for a seamless browsing experience. We’re working on releasing this feature for free users too. 

DeepL Pro login 
DeepL Pro users can log in to their accounts through the extension.

Shortcuts
Use simple shortcuts to make translation quicker and easier. You can set your own shortcuts in the settings.

Unparalleled accuracy
You can rest assured that you’re getting the best possible translations on the website or application you’re using. DeepL translations consistently outperform the competition and are proven to be three times more accurate than translations from major tech companies.

Loved by millions of users
Millions of people around the world use DeepL every day to improve their communication.

We really hope that our translator will be useful to you! We look forward to your feedback and ratings! Also write your suggestions for improving the functionality - help@u-language.com
long.fr:
Cette extension offre une gamme de fonctionnalités pour vous aider à naviguer dans différentes langues en ligne. Il vous permet de traduire sans effort des pages Web, du texte en surbrillance, des sous-titres Netflix et des messages privés. Vous pouvez également faire lire le texte à haute voix et enregistrer les traductions importantes dans votre dictionnaire personnel pour l'apprentissage.

Vous rencontrez des mots inconnus en lisant un article en ligne ? Aucun problème! Sélectionnez simplement le texte que vous souhaitez traduire, et d'un simple clic sur un bouton, vous obtiendrez la traduction. Vous pouvez également prononcer le texte traduit et l'enregistrer directement dans votre dictionnaire.

Pour la saisie de texte et la traduction, cliquez simplement sur le bouton d'extension pour ouvrir une fenêtre contextuelle. Le beau design de l'extension le rend facile à utiliser, vous permettant d'explorer ses fonctionnalités et de choisir votre thème de couleur préféré.

traducteur pour Chrome est le meilleur et le plus simple moyen de traduire rapidement une partie du contenu dont vous avez besoin, comme des mots, des phrases ou même des éléments de menu.

Traduisez des mots et des phrases lorsque vous naviguez sur le Web à l'aide de Google Traduction. Traduisez pendant que vous lisez et écrivez avec Quick Translate, le traducteur le plus précis au monde.

Avec ce traducteur, vous pouvez profiter de la qualité de traduction imbattable de Google Translate sans quitter votre navigateur.

Traduire en lisant
Apprenez une langue en lisant ce que vous aimez. Traduisez des mots et des phrases en direct sur n'importe quelle page Web. Cliquez sur des mots ou des phrases sur n'importe quel site pour les traduire.

Téléchargez gratuitement Quick Translate pour Chrome pour commencer à traduire dès aujourd'hui.

Mettez en surbrillance le mot ou le texte que vous souhaitez traduire et vous verrez immédiatement la traduction dans votre langue. Le tout dans une extension de navigateur simple et compréhensible.

➖ Entièrement gratuit. Ne nécessite pas d'inscription ni d'abonnement ;
➖ Prend en charge plus de 120 langues ;
➖ Détection automatique de la langue ;
➖ Voix textuelle pour 60 langues ;
➖ Traduction inversée ;
➖ Fonctionne sur tous les sites, y compris Gmail, Facebook, Twitter et autres ;
➖ Interface utilisateur pratique et intuitive de l'extension ;
➖ Traduire des mots à l'aide d'un dictionnaire (+ le dictionnaire fonctionne hors ligne).

Traduisez votre écriture
Avec le traducteur, vous pouvez écrire votre contenu en haut de la fenêtre contextuelle et obtenir la traduction en bas. Toutes les traductions (comme le français, l'allemand, l'espagnol, l'arabe et quatre-vingt-dix-sept autres langues) sont alimentées par des traductions automatiques neuronales de Google Translate qui traduisent avec précision votre contenu.

Le traducteur lit et reproduit des mots, des phrases et des textes entiers à l'aide d'une traduction de synthèse vocale humaine de qualité. Il montre la transcription et la translittération, sait également reproduire des mots ou des textes avec le bon accent et avec le bon accent. Apprenez les mots de prononciation corrects tout de suite, sans le reporter à plus tard !

fonctionnalité de traduction :

Texte pour parler

long.hu:
This extension offers a range of features to help you navigate different languages online. It allows you to effortlessly translate web pages, highlighted text, Netflix subtitles, and private messages. You can also have the text read aloud and save important translations to your personal dictionary for learning.

Encountering unfamiliar words while reading an online article? No problem! Simply select the text you want to translate, and with a click of a button, you'll get the translation. You can also speak the translated text and save it directly to your dictionary.

For text input and translation, just click the extension button to open a pop-up window. The extension's beautiful design makes it easy to use, allowing you to explore its functionality and choose your preferred color theme.

Web Translator is your everyday helper to translate an unknown foreign word, sentence, or whole article. It’s a simple and fast way to translate text into another language without breaking away from work.

Translate while you read and write with Web Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

You'll be able to translate effortlessly and instantly whatever you're reading or writing within Chrome. Select and right-click on any text and choose to translate this selection. 

Due to a language barrier, you no longer must worry about missing any information throughout the web. 

Download Translator for Chrome for free to start translating today.

FUTURE

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them.

Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.

Double click translation
You will be able to translate on double-click to get a quick translation of words.

Text-to-speech 
Use TTS function that helps you learn how words sound as well as phonetic transcription.

Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Translation History
All translation history is stored in your browser's local storage. To find or delete your translation history, click the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser. Then click the "Show translation history" icon in the pop-up window. This translator does not use any cloud storage. Therefore, after removing the extension, all your translation history will be deleted from the browser's local storage without the possibility of recovery.

Extension relies on Google Translator to quickly translate individual words on the web page you are currently viewing.

long.it:
Questa estensione offre una gamma di funzionalità per aiutarti a navigare in diverse lingue online. Ti consente di tradurre facilmente pagine Web, testo evidenziato, sottotitoli Netflix e messaggi privati. Puoi anche leggere il testo ad alta voce e salvare traduzioni importanti nel tuo dizionario personale per l'apprendimento.

Incontrare parole sconosciute durante la lettura di un articolo online? Nessun problema! Seleziona semplicemente il testo che desideri tradurre e, con un clic di un pulsante, otterrai la traduzione. Puoi anche pronunciare il testo tradotto e salvarlo direttamente nel tuo dizionario.

Per l'inserimento e la traduzione del testo, basta fare clic sul pulsante dell'estensione per aprire una finestra pop-up. Il bellissimo design dell'estensione lo rende facile da usare, permettendoti di esplorarne le funzionalità e scegliere il tuo tema di colore preferito.

Traduttore per Chrome il modo migliore e più semplice per tradurre rapidamente parte del contenuto di cui hai bisogno, come parole, frasi o persino voci di menu.

Traduci parole e frasi mentre navighi sul Web, utilizzando Google Traduttore. Traduci mentre leggi e scrivi con Quick Translate, il traduttore più preciso al mondo.

Con questo traduttore, puoi goderti l'imbattibile qualità di traduzione di Google translate senza uscire dal tuo browser.

Tradurre durante la lettura
Impara una lingua leggendo quello che vuoi. Traduci parole e frasi dal vivo su qualsiasi pagina web. Fai clic su parole o frasi su qualsiasi sito per tradurle.

Scarica gratuitamente Quick Translate per Chrome per iniziare a tradurre oggi stesso.

Evidenzia la parola o il testo che vuoi tradurre e vedrai immediatamente la traduzione nella tua lingua. Tutto in un'estensione del browser semplice e comprensibile.

➖ Completamente gratuito. Non richiede registrazione o abbonamenti;
➖ Supporta oltre 120 lingue;
➖ Rilevamento automatico della lingua;
➖ Testo recitazione vocale per 60 lingue;
➖ Traduzione inversa;
➖ Funziona su tutti i siti inclusi Gmail, Facebook, Twitter e altri;
➖ Interfaccia utente comoda e intuitiva dell'estensione;
➖ Tradurre parole usando un dizionario (+ il dizionario funziona offline).

Traduci la tua scrittura
Con il traduttore, puoi scrivere il tuo contenuto nella parte superiore del pop-up e ottenere la traduzione nella parte inferiore. Tutte le traduzioni (come francese, tedesco, spagnolo, arabo e altre novantasette lingue) sono alimentate da traduzioni automatiche neurali di Google Translate che traduce accuratamente i tuoi contenuti.

il traduttore legge e riproduce parole, frasi e interi testi utilizzando una traduzione da testo a voce umana (TTS) di qualità. Mostra trascrizione e traslitterazione, sa anche riprodurre parole o testi con l'accento corretto e con l'accento corretto. Impara subito le parole di pronuncia corrette, senza rimandare per dopo!

funzionalità del traduttore:
✔️ Traduzione di pagine Web: traduzione completa di pagine Web con traduzione al passaggio del mouse
✔️ dizionario - Significato delle parole, pronuncia, sinonimi, ipernimi, iponimi e altro ancora.
✔️ segnalibri: tiene traccia di tutte le modifiche apportate ai segnalibri. Salvataggio della cronologia delle traduzioni.
✔️ Sintesi vocale: ascolta la pronuncia corretta e riproduci parole e testi con l'accento corretto.
✔️ traduzione delle immagini (riconoscimento delle immagini) - Basta selezionare l'area sul monitor che si desidera tradurre (il principio di lavoro è come nello strumento screenshot).

Nella nuova versione dell'estensione, abbiamo aggiunto la possibilità di selezionare i traduttori. Ora non è necessario installare programmi o applicazioni aggiuntivi per utilizzare Google Translate, tutto in un'unica comoda estensione, con tutte le funzionalità disponibili per il traduttore uLanguage.

Sintesi vocale
Usa la funzione TTS che ti aiuta a imparare come suonano le parole e la trascrizione fonetica.

Traduzioni a tutta pagina
Traduci intere pagine Web nella lingua desiderata con un solo clic. Questa è una nuova funzionalità fornita gratuitamente da Google Translator che abbiamo integrato nel nostro traduttore.

Bing Translator un altro grande nome nei siti Web di traduzione online gratuiti è Bing, che utilizza Microsoft Translator. Puoi selezionare la lingua di input o fare in modo che il sito la rilevi automaticamente durante la digitazione. Se hai il microfono abilitato, puoi pronunciare il testo che vuoi tradurre, il che sembra abbastanza comodo se ce lo chiedi.

Translate Translator consente a viaggiatori, studenti, professionisti aziendali, datori di lavoro e personale medico di leggere, scrivere e parlare nelle lingue desiderate e tradurre ovunque nel mondo.

• Traduttore di testi: ottieni traduzioni gratuite di testi in oltre 100 lingue.
• Traduci testo in voce: ascolta la traduzione con voci maschili o femminili.
• Passa da un dialetto all'altro quando traduci.
• Dizionario e Thesaurus per tutte le lingue.
• Traslitterazione, Condivisione, Preferiti, Cronologia e molto altro.
• Traduttore di foto: con Translator, puoi utilizzare la tua fotocamera per tradurre menu, cartelli e molto altro all'istante.
• Traduzione offline: traduci in oltre 40 lingue senza una connessione a Internet.
• Traduttore vocale: traduce conversazioni e discorsi da voce a voce.
• Coniugazioni verbali in tempi diversi.
Basta scegliere quale traduttore vuoi usare oggi: uLanguage translate o Google translate.

Usa il traduttore per i tuoi viaggi nel 2023:
- tradurre testo e voce in pochi secondi
- tradurre la domanda per la gente del posto,
- tradurre conversazioni nei negozi,
- tradurre segni e puntatori.

Il traduttore Microsoft è un'app di traduzione personale gratuita per oltre 70 lingue, per tradurre testo, voce, conversazioni, foto della fotocamera e schermate. Puoi anche scaricare gratuitamente le lingue per la traduzione offline da utilizzare quando viaggi.
long.ja:
この翻訳者は、未知の外国語、文、または記事全体を翻訳するための毎日のヘルパーです。 仕事を中断することなく、テキストを別の言語に翻訳する簡単で迅速な方法です。

世界で最も正確な翻訳者である Web Translate を使用して、読み書きしながら翻訳します。

この翻訳者を使用すると、ブラウザーを離れることなく、Google 翻訳の比類のない翻訳品質を楽しむことができます。

Chrome で読み書きしているものは何でも、簡単かつ瞬時に翻訳できます。 任意のテキストを選択して右クリックし、この選択を翻訳することを選択します。

言葉の壁が原因で、ウェブ全体で情報を見逃す心配はもうありません。

Chrome 用の翻訳者を無料でダウンロードして、今日から翻訳を始めましょう。

将来

読みながら翻訳
好きなものを読んで言語を学びましょう。 単語やフレーズを Web ページ上でリアルタイムに翻訳します。 サイトの単語やフレーズをクリックして翻訳します。

あなたの文章を翻訳する
翻訳者を使用すると、ポップアップの上部にコンテンツを書き込み、下部に翻訳を表示できます。 すべての翻訳 (フランス語、ドイツ語、スペイン語、アラビア語、その他 97 の言語など) は、コンテンツを正確に翻訳する Google 翻訳によるニューラル機械翻訳によって強化されています。

ダブルクリック翻訳
ダブルクリックで翻訳して、単語をすばやく翻訳できます。

テキスト読み上げ
TTS 機能を使用すると、単語の発音と音声表記を学習できます。

全ページ翻訳
ワンクリックでウェブページ全体をご希望の言語に翻訳します。 これは、Google 翻訳者が無料で提供する新機能で、翻訳者に統合されています。

翻訳履歴
すべての翻訳履歴は、ブラウザのローカル ストレージに保存されます。 翻訳履歴を検索または削除するには、ブラウザの右上隅にある拡張機能のアイコンをクリックします。 次に、ポップアップ ウィンドウの [翻訳履歴を表示] アイコンをクリックします。 この翻訳者は、クラウド ストレージを使用しません。 そのため、拡張機能を削除すると、すべての翻訳履歴がブラウザのローカル ストレージから削除され、復元することはできなくなります。

이 번역기를 사용하면 브라우저를 종료하지 않고도 Google 번역의 탁월한 번역 품질을 즐길 수 있습니다.

읽는 동안 번역
당신이 좋아하는 것을 읽고 언어를 배우십시오. 모든 웹 페이지에서 실시간으로 단어 및 구를 번역합니다. 사이트에서 단어나 구를 클릭하여 번역하세요.

지금 바로 번역을 시작하려면 Chrome용 빠른 번역을 무료로 다운로드하세요.

번역하려는 단어나 텍스트를 강조 표시하면 해당 언어로 번역된 내용을 즉시 볼 수 있습니다. 하나의 간단하고 이해하기 쉬운 브라우저 확장 기능.

➖ 완전 무료. 등록이나 구독이 필요하지 않습니다.
➖ 120개 이상의 언어를 지원합니다.
➖ 자동 언어 감지;
➖ 60개 언어의 텍스트 음성 연기;
➖ 역번역;
➖ Gmail, Facebook, Twitter 등을 포함한 모든 사이트에서 작동합니다.
➖ 확장의 편리하고 직관적인 사용자 인터페이스;
➖ 사전을 사용하여 단어 번역(+ 사전은 오프라인에서 작동).

당신의 글을 번역하세요
번역기를 사용하면 팝업 상단에 내용을 작성하고 하단에서 번역을 받을 수 있습니다. 모든 번역(예: 프랑스어, 독일어, 스페인어, 아랍어 및 기타 97개 언어)은 콘텐츠를 정확하게 번역하는 Google 번역의 신경망 기계 번역에 의해 구동됩니다.

번역가는 고품질 TTS(텍스트 음성 변환) 번역을 사용하여 단어, 구 및 전체 텍스트를 읽고 재생산합니다. 필사 및 음역을 보여주고 올바른 억양과 강세로 단어나 텍스트를 재현하는 방법도 알고 있습니다. 나중으로 미루지 말고 바로 정확한 발음 단어를 배우세요!

번역기 기능:
✔️ 웹 페이지 번역 - 마우스 호버 번역으로 전체 웹 페이지 번역
✔️ 사전 - 단어의 의미, 발음, 동의어, 상위어, 하위어 등.
✔️ 북마크 - 북마크에 대한 모든 변경 사항을 추적합니다. 번역 기록을 저장합니다.
✔️ 텍스트 음성 변환 - 정확한 발음을 듣고 올바른 악센트로 단어와 텍스트를 재생합니다.
✔️ 이미지 번역(이미지 인식) - 모니터에서 번역하고 싶은 부분을 선택하면 됩니다(작업 원리는 스크린샷 도구와 같습니다).

새 버전의 확장에서는 번역자를 선택하는 기능을 추가했습니다. 이제 uLanguage 번역기에서 사용할 수 있는 모든 기능과 함께 하나의 편리한 확장 프로그램으로 Google 번역을 사용하기 위해 추가 프로그램이나 응용 프로그램을 설치할 필요가 없습니다.

텍스트 음성 변환
단어의 소리와 음성 표기를 학습하는 데 도움이 되는 TTS 기능을 사용하세요.

전체 페이지 번역
클릭 한 번으로 전체 웹 페이지를 원하는 언어로 번역하세요. 이것은 우리가 번역기에 통합한 Google 번역기에서 무료로 제공하는 새로운 기능입니다.

Bing 번역기 무료 온라인 번역 웹사이트의 또 다른 큰 이름은 Microsoft Translator를 사용하는 Bing입니다. 입력 언어를 선택하거나 입력할 때 사이트에서 자동으로 감지하도록 할 수 있습니다. 마이크가 활성화되어 있으면 번역하고 싶은 텍스트를 말할 수 있습니다. 요청하면 매우 편리해 보입니다.

Translate Translator를 사용하면 여행자, 학생, 비즈니스 전문가, 고용주 및 의료진이 원하는 언어로 읽고 쓰고 말하고 전 세계 어디에서나 번역할 수 있습니다.

• 텍스트 번역기: 100개 이상의 언어로 된 텍스트를 무료로 번역합니다.
• 텍스트를 음성으로 번역: 남성 또는 여성 음성으로 번역을 듣습니다.
• 번역할 때 다른 방언 사이를 전환합니다.
• 모든 언어에 대한 사전 및 동의어 사전.
• 음역, 공유, 즐겨찾기, 기록 등.
• 사진 번역기: 번역기를 사용하면 카메라를 사용하여 메뉴, 기호 등을 즉시 번역할 수 있습니다.
• 오프라인 번역: 인터넷 연결 없이 40개 이상의 언어로 번역합니다.
• 음성 번역기: 음성 대 음성 대화 및 음성을 번역합니다.
• 다른 시제의 동사 활용형.
uLanguage 번역 또는 Google 번역 중에서 오늘 사용할 번역기를 선택하세요.

2023년 여행에 번역기를 사용하세요.
- 텍스트와 음성을 몇 초 만에 번역
- 현지인을 위한 번역 질문,
- 상점에서 대화 번역,
- 기호와 포인터를 번역합니다.

Microsoft 번역기는 70개 이상의 언어로 텍스트, 음성, 대화, 카메라 사진 및 스크린샷을 번역하는 무료 개인 번역 앱입니다. 여행할 때 사용할 오프라인 번역 언어를 무료로 다운로드할 수도 있습니다.

저희 번역사가 여러분에게 도움이 되기를 진심으로 바랍니다! 여러분의 피드백과 평가를 기다리겠습니다! 또한 기능 개선을 위한 제안을 작성하십시오 - help@u-language.com





translator for Chrome best and easiest way to quickly translate part of the content that you need, such as words, phrases, or even menu items. 

Translate words and phrases while browsing the web, using Google Translate. Translate while you read and write with Quick Translate, the world's most accurate translator.

With this translator, you can enjoy Google translate unbeatable translation quality without leaving your browser.

Translate while reading
Learn a language by reading whatever you like. Translate words & phrases live on any web page. Click words or phrases on any site to translate them. 

Download Quick Translate for Chrome for free to start translating today.

Highlight the word or text you want to translate and you will immediately see the translation into your language. All in one simple and understandable browser extension. 

➖ Completely free. Doesn't require registration or any subscriptions;
➖ Supports over 120 languages;
➖ Automatic language detection;
➖ Text voice acting for 60 languages; 
➖ Reverse translation; 
➖ Works on all sites including Gmail, Facebook, Twitter and others;
➖ Convenient and intuitive user interface of the extension;
➖ Translating words using a dictionary (+ dictionary works offline).

Translate your writing
With the translator, you can write your content at the top of the pop-up and get the translation at the bottom. All translations (like French, German, Spanish, Arabic, and ninety-seven other languages) are powered by neural machine translations by Google Translate that accurately translates your content.

translator reads and reproduces words, phrases and entire texts using quality human text-to-speech (TTS) translation. It shows transcription and transliteration, also knows how to reproduce words or texts with the correct accent and with correct stress. Learn the correct pronunciation words right away, without postponing it for later!

translator functionality:
✔️ Web page translation - full web page translation with mouse hover translation
✔️ dictionary  -  Word meaning, pronunciation, synonyms, hypernyms, hyponyms and more.
✔️ bookmarks  - Keeps track of all the changes you made to your bookmarks. Saving translation history.
✔️ text to speech - Hear correct pronunciation and play words and texts with correct accent.
✔️ image translation (image recognition) - Just select the area on the monitor that you want to translate (the principle of work is as in the screenshot tool).

In the new version of the extension, we have added the ability to select translators. Now you do not need to install additional programs or applications to use Google Translate, all in one convenient extension, with all the features that are available for the uLanguage translator.

Text-to-speech 
Use TTS function that helps you learn how words sound as well as phonetic transcription.

Full-page translations
Translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. This is a new feature provided by Google Translator for free that we integrated into our translator.

Bing Translator another big name in free online translation websites is Bing, which uses Microsoft Translator. You can select your input language or have the site automatically detect it as you type. If you have your microphone enabled, you can speak the text you want to be translated, which seems quite convenient if you ask us.

Translate Translator enables travelers, students, business professionals, employers, and medical staff to read, write and speak in the desired languages and translate anywhere in the world.

• Text translator: Get free translation for text in over 100 languages.
• Translate text to speech: Listen to translation in male or female voices.
• Switch between different dialects when you translate.
• Dictionary & Thesaurus for all languages.
• Transliteration, Sharing, Favorites, History, and much more.
• Photo translator: With Translator, you can use your camera to translate menus, signs, and more instantly.
• Offline translation: Translate in over 40 Languages without an Internet connection.
• Voice translator: Translate Voice-to-Voice conversation and speech.
• Verb conjugations in different tenses.
Just choose which translator you want to use today: uLanguage translate or Google translate.

Use the translator for your travel journeys in 2023:
- translate text and voice in seconds
- translate question for local people,
- translate conversation in shops,
- translate signs and pointers.

Microsoft translator is a free, personal translation app for more than 70 languages, to translate text, voice, conversations, camera photos and screenshots. You can also download languages for offline translation for free to use when you travel.

We really hope that our translator will be useful to you! We look forward to your feedback and ratings! Also write your suggestions for improving the functionality - help@u-language.com

Simple translator. Translate select text from websites.
Translate It app translates texts, words from any web page into your language. Easy translator and dictionary.

Translator and dictionary - LET YOU SELECT AND TRANSLATE TEXT FRAGMENTS
How it works?
1. Install Translator the extension from the Chrome Web store.
2. Go to the document or to the page where you want to translate
some text.
3. Select text you need and translate it.
4. Get your translation.

👉 Translate words and sentences
👉 Speak and translate text
👉 Listen to translated text
👉 Easily copy and paste text
👉 Share translate text with your friends
👉 Detailed history
👉 Simple and attractive user interface
👉 Free Translator with speech
👉 Free Translate different language
👉 Completely free and faster
👉 Best word translation app
👉 Translate more than 100 language
👉 Copy and delete text with one click with translator

Voice Translator:

The main function of free language translator application is voice translator. 

Just speak and translate all your words easily in the selected language. Speak at once and translate it multiple time in different languages. Press on the voice button and hold it on and speak words that you want to translate and your words will be translated in your desired language easily. Translate free is the best language translator by voice application. Translate text with this translator or web translate tool, переводчик для хром браузера.

Translate:
Translator will always help you to understand foreign texts on any website and even in PDF documents! Do not worry about unknown words! Just one click and the language barrier is broken. Select a word and it will automatically identify the relevant expressions in your text. Select a sentence or paragraph and get its translation on the page itself, instantly. Listen to pronunciation and discover real-life examples of usage.

INLINE TRANSLATOR
Inline Translator translates selected text sentence-by-sentence, and inserts the translation into the webpage preserving the original formatting.  

HOW TO LAUNCH Translator
  * click Translator button on the Chrome toolbar
  * use the context menu Translator, then choose preferred translation application

HOW TO TRANSLATE SELECTION
Select the text and:
* click Translator extension button on the Chrome toolbar to run Translator standalone application. 
 * click Translator floating button to run Pop-up Bubble Translator. 
* use the context menu Translator, then select Inline Translator.
long.lt:
Šis plėtinys siūlo daugybę funkcijų, padedančių naršyti įvairiomis kalbomis internete. Tai leidžia be vargo išversti tinklalapius, paryškintą tekstą, „Netflix“ subtitrus ir asmeninius pranešimus. Taip pat galite perskaityti tekstą garsiai ir išsaugoti svarbius vertimus asmeniniame žodyne, kad galėtumėte mokytis.

Skaitydami internetinį straipsnį susidūrėte su nepažįstamais žodžiais? Jokiu problemu! Tiesiog pasirinkite tekstą, kurį norite išversti, ir vienu mygtuko paspaudimu gausite vertimą. Taip pat galite pasakyti išverstą tekstą ir įrašyti jį tiesiai į savo žodyną.

Norėdami įvesti ir išversti tekstą, tiesiog spustelėkite plėtinio mygtuką, kad atidarytumėte iššokantįjį langą. Gražus plėtinio dizainas leidžia jį lengvai naudoti, todėl galite ištirti jo funkcionalumą ir pasirinkti pageidaujamą spalvų temą.

Geriausias ir paprasčiausias būdas greitai išversti dalį reikalingo turinio, pvz., Žodžius, frazes ar net meniu elementus.

Pažymėkite žodį ar tekstą, kurį norite išversti, ir iškart pamatysite vertimą į jūsų kalbą. Viskas viename paprastame ir suprantamame naršyklės plėtinyje.

➖ Visiškai nemokama. Nereikia registracijos ar jokių prenumeratų;
➖ palaiko daugiau nei 120 kalbų;
➖ automatinis kalbos aptikimas;
➖ Teksto balsas, veikiantis 60 kalbų;
➖ Atvirkštinis vertimas; Translate
➖ Veikia visose svetainėse, įskaitant „Gmail“, „Facebook“, „Twitter“ ir kitas;
➖ Patogi ir intuityvi plėtinio vartotojo sąsaja;
➖ Žodžių vertimas naudojant žodyną (+ žodynas veikia neprisijungus).

Vertėjas „uLanguage“ skaito ir atkuria žodžius, frazes ir ištisus tekstus naudodamas kokybišką vertimą iš žmogaus į kalbą (TTS). Tai rodo transkripciją ir transliteraciją, taip pat žino, kaip atkurti žodžius ar tekstus su taisyklingu kirčiu ir taisyklingu kirčiavimu. Išmokite teisingus tarimo žodžius iš karto, neatidėliodami jų vėliau!

Funkcionalumas:

✔️ Tinklalapio vertimas - visas tinklalapio vertimas su pelės žymeklio užvedimu

✔️ žodynas - žodžio reikšmė, tarimas, sinonimai, hipermanai, hiponimai ir dar daugiau.

✔️ Žymės - stebi visus jūsų žymių pakeitimus. Vertimo istorijos išsaugojimas.

✔️ Tekstas į kalbą - išgirskite teisingą tarimą ir žaiskite žodžius bei tekstus su teisingu akcentu.

✔️ Vaizdo vertimas (atpažinimas) - tiesiog pasirinkite monitoriaus sritį, kurią norite išversti (darbo principas toks, koks yra ekrano kopijos įrankyje).

Mes labai tikimės, kad mūsų vertėjas jums bus naudingas! Laukiame jūsų atsiliepimų ir įvertinimų! Taip pat parašykite savo pasiūlymus, kaip pagerinti funkcionalumą - help@u-language.com

Do you want to write the text yourself and translate it? Just open the window uLanguage by clicking on the button next to the address field of your browser.

The extension understands more than 120 languages. uLanguage can also teach you the correct pronunciation. It shows phonetic transcription, transliteration and can pronounce words and texts with correct stress.

You can set your language in extension settings. Users can also easily translate snippets of text, as well as listen to the proper pronunciation of translated words and phrases on a new tab or in popup.

FEATURES:
 * Translate Inline translator can be run on mouse selection from the context menu, or shortcut.
 * Insert translation after or before the selected text.
 * Translate can replace the original text.
 * Translate the original page formatting.
 * Translate translation in brackets or without.
 * Translate translation for better visibility by using the line break option.
 * Control of the text selection by observing the word boundaries.
 * Select color of the translated text.
 * Clear inserted translation and restore original page formatting.
 * Auto language detection of the source text.
 *  Translate Words translation using the built-in dictionary.
 * Translation history.
 * Translate customization.

КАК ЗАПУСТИТЬ Переводчик
   * нажмите кнопку «Переводчик» на панели инструментов Chrome.
   * Переводчик или Translator, translate воспользуйтесь контекстным меню «Переводчик», затем выберите предпочтительное приложение для перевода.

КАК ПЕРЕВЕСТИ ВЫБОР
Выделите текст и:
* нажмите кнопку «Расширение переводчика» на панели инструментов Chrome, чтобы запустить автономное приложение «Переводчик».
  * нажмите плавающую кнопку «Переводчик», чтобы запустить «Переводчик всплывающих пузырьков».
* воспользуйтесь контекстным меню «Переводчик», затем выберите «Встроенный переводчик». Переводчик для Хрома
long.lv:
Šis paplašinājums piedāvā virkni funkciju, lai palīdzētu jums tiešsaistē pārvietoties dažādās valodās. Tas ļauj bez piepūles tulkot tīmekļa lapas, izcelto tekstu, Netflix subtitrus un privātās ziņas. Varat arī likt tekstu nolasīt skaļi un saglabāt svarīgus tulkojumus savā personīgajā vārdnīcā, lai mācītos.

Vai, lasot tiešsaistes rakstu, sastopaties ar nepazīstamiem vārdiem? Nekādu problēmu! Vienkārši atlasiet tekstu, kuru vēlaties tulkot, un, noklikšķinot uz pogas, jūs saņemsit tulkojumu. Varat arī ierunāt tulkoto tekstu un saglabāt to tieši savā vārdnīcā.

Teksta ievadei un tulkošanai vienkārši noklikšķiniet uz paplašinājuma pogas, lai atvērtu uznirstošo logu. Paplašinājuma skaistais dizains atvieglo tā lietošanu, ļaujot izpētīt tā funkcionalitāti un izvēlēties vēlamo krāsu motīvu.

Labākais un vienkāršākais veids, kā ātri pārtulkot nepieciešamo satura daļu, piemēram, vārdus, frāzes vai pat izvēlnes vienumus.

Iezīmējiet vārdu vai tekstu, kuru vēlaties tulkot, un jūs uzreiz redzēsiet tulkojumu jūsu valodā. Viss vienā vienkāršā un saprotamā pārlūkprogrammas paplašinājumā.

➖ Pilnīgi bez maksas. Neprasa reģistrāciju vai abonēšanu;

➖ automātiska valodas noteikšana;
➖ teksta balss darbība 60 valodās;
➖ Reversā tulkošana;
➖ Darbojas visās vietnēs, tostarp Gmail, Facebook, Twitter un citās;
➖ Ērta un intuitīva paplašinājuma lietotāja saskarne;
➖ Vārdu tulkošana, izmantojot vārdnīcu (+ vārdnīca darbojas bezsaistē).

Tulkotājs uLanguage lasa un reproducē vārdus, frāzes un veselus tekstus, izmantojot kvalitatīvu cilvēka teksta-runas (TTS) tulkojumu. Tas parāda transkripciju un transliterāciju, zina, kā reproducēt vārdus vai tekstus ar pareizu akcentu un ar pareizu uzsvaru. Uzziniet pareizos izrunas vārdus uzreiz, neatliekot tos uz vēlāku laiku!

vertaler voor Chrome beste en gemakkelijkste manier om snel een deel van de inhoud te vertalen die u nodig hebt, zoals woorden, zinnen of zelfs menu-items.

➖ Woorden vertalen met behulp van een woordenboek (+ woordenboek werkt offline).

Vertaal je schrijven
Met de vertaler kunt u uw inhoud bovenaan de pop-up schrijven en de vertaling onderaan krijgen. Alle vertalingen (zoals Frans, Duits, Spaans, Arabisch en zevenennegentig andere talen) worden mogelijk gemaakt door neurale machinevertalingen van Google Translate die uw inhoud nauwkeurig vertalen.

vertaler leest en reproduceert woorden, zinnen en volledige teksten met behulp van menselijke tekst-naar-spraak (TTS) vertalingen van hoge kwaliteit. Het toont transcriptie en transliteratie, weet ook woorden of teksten met het juiste accent en met de juiste klemtoon te reproduceren. Leer meteen de juiste uitspraakwoorden, zonder het uit te stellen tot later!

vertaler functionaliteit:

Denne utvidelsen tilbyr en rekke funksjoner som hjelper deg med å navigere på forskjellige språk på nettet. Den lar deg enkelt oversette nettsider, uthevet tekst, Netflix-undertekster og private meldinger. Du kan også få teksten lest opp og lagre viktige oversettelser til din personlige ordbok for læring.

Møter du ukjente ord mens du leser en nettartikkel? Ikke noe problem! Bare velg teksten du vil oversette, og med et klikk på en knapp får du oversettelsen. Du kan også lese den oversatte teksten og lagre den direkte i ordboken din.

For tekstinntasting og oversettelse klikker du bare på utvidelsesknappen for å åpne et popup-vindu. Utvidelsens vakre design gjør den enkel å bruke, slik at du kan utforske funksjonaliteten og velge ditt foretrukne fargetema.

oversetter for Chrome beste og enkleste måten å raskt oversette deler av innholdet du trenger, for eksempel ord, setninger eller til og med menyelementer.

Oversett mens du leser
Lær et språk ved å lese hva du vil. Oversett ord og uttrykk direkte på alle nettsider. Klikk på ord eller uttrykk på et hvilket som helst nettsted for å oversette dem.

Last ned Quick Translate for Chrome gratis for å begynne å oversette i dag.

Marker ordet eller teksten du vil oversette, og du vil umiddelbart se oversettelsen til ditt språk. Alt i en enkel og forståelig nettleserutvidelse.

➖ Helt gratis. Krever ikke registrering eller abonnement;
➖ Støtter over 120 språk;
➖ Automatisk språkdeteksjon;
➖ Tekst stemmeskuespill for 60 språk;

➖ Praktisk og intuitivt brukergrensesnitt for utvidelsen;
➖ Oversette ord ved hjelp av en ordbok (+ ordbok fungerer offline).

Oversett det du skriver
Med oversetteren kan du skrive innholdet ditt øverst i popup-vinduet og få oversettelsen nederst. Alle oversettelser (som fransk, tysk, spansk, arabisk og nittisju andre språk) er drevet av nevrale maskinoversettelser fra Google Translate som nøyaktig oversetter innholdet ditt.

oversetter leser og reproduserer ord, setninger og hele tekster ved hjelp av kvalitetsoversettelse av menneskelig tekst-til-tale (TTS). Den viser transkripsjon og translitterasjon, vet også hvordan man gjengir ord eller tekster med riktig aksent og med korrekt stress. Lær de riktige uttaleordene med en gang, uten å utsette det til senere!

oversetter funksjonalitet:
✔️ Nettsideoversettelse - full nettsideoversettelse med oversettelse av musepekeren
✔️ ordbok - Ordets betydning, uttale, synonymer, hypernyms, hyponyms og mer.
✔️ bokmerker - Holder styr på alle endringene du har gjort i bokmerkene dine. Lagrer oversettelsesloggen.
✔️ tekst til tale - Hør korrekt uttale og spill ord og tekster med riktig aksent.
✔️ bildeoversettelse (bildegjenkjenning) - Bare velg området på skjermen du vil oversette (arbeidsprinsippet er som i skjermbildeverktøyet).

I den nye versjonen av utvidelsen har vi lagt til muligheten til å velge oversettere. Nå trenger du ikke å installere flere programmer eller applikasjoner for å bruke Google Translate, alt i en praktisk utvidelse, med alle funksjonene som er tilgjengelige for uLanguage-oversetteren.

Tekst til tale
Bruk TTS-funksjonen som hjelper deg å lære hvordan ord høres ut samt fonetisk transkripsjon.

Oversett hele nettsider til ønsket språk med bare ett klikk. Dette er en ny funksjon fra Google Translator gratis som vi integrerte i oversetteren vår.

long.pl:
To rozszerzenie oferuje szereg funkcji ułatwiających poruszanie się w różnych językach online. Pozwala bez wysiłku tłumaczyć strony internetowe, wyróżniony tekst, napisy Netflix i prywatne wiadomości. Możesz także przeczytać tekst na głos i zapisać ważne tłumaczenia w swoim osobistym słowniku do nauki.

Napotykasz nieznane słowa podczas czytania artykułu online? Bez problemu! Po prostu wybierz tekst, który chcesz przetłumaczyć, a jednym kliknięciem otrzymasz tłumaczenie. Możesz także wypowiedzieć przetłumaczony tekst i zapisać go bezpośrednio w swoim słowniku.

Aby wprowadzić tekst i przetłumaczyć, po prostu kliknij przycisk rozszerzenia, aby otworzyć wyskakujące okienko. Piękny wygląd rozszerzenia sprawia, że jest ono łatwe w użyciu, umożliwiając poznanie jego funkcjonalności i wybranie preferowanego motywu kolorystycznego.

translator dla Chrome najlepszy i najłatwiejszy sposób na szybkie przetłumaczenie części potrzebnej treści, takiej jak słowa, wyrażenia, a nawet elementy menu.

Dzięki temu tłumaczowi możesz cieszyć się niezrównaną jakością tłumaczeń Google bez opuszczania przeglądarki.

Tłumacz podczas czytania

Pobierz bezpłatnie Szybkie tłumaczenie dla Chrome, aby zacząć tłumaczyć już dziś.

Zaznacz słowo lub tekst, który chcesz przetłumaczyć, a natychmiast zobaczysz tłumaczenie na swój język. Wszystko w jednym prostym i zrozumiałym rozszerzeniu przeglądarki.

➖ Całkowicie za darmo. Nie wymaga rejestracji ani żadnych subskrypcji;
➖ Obsługuje ponad 120 języków;

➖ Działa na wszystkich stronach, w tym na Gmailu, Facebooku, Twitterze i innych;
➖ Wygodny i intuicyjny interfejs użytkownika rozszerzenia;
➖ Tłumaczenie słów za pomocą słownika (+ słownik działa w trybie offline).

Przetłumacz swój tekst
Dzięki tłumaczowi możesz napisać treść na górze wyskakującego okienka i uzyskać tłumaczenie na dole. Wszystkie tłumaczenia (takie jak francuski, niemiecki, hiszpański, arabski i dziewięćdziesiąt siedem innych języków) są oparte na neuronowych tłumaczeniach maszynowych Tłumacza Google, które dokładnie tłumaczą Twoje treści.

tłumacz odczytuje i odtwarza słowa, frazy i całe teksty przy użyciu wysokiej jakości tłumaczenia tekstu na mowę (TTS). Pokazuje transkrypcję i transliterację, wie również, jak odtworzyć słowa lub teksty z poprawnym akcentem i odpowiednim akcentem. Naucz się poprawnej wymowy słów od razu, bez odkładania tego na później!

funkcjonalność tłumacza:
✔️ Tłumaczenie strony internetowej - pełne tłumaczenie strony internetowej z tłumaczeniem po najechaniu myszką

✔️ tekst na mowę - Usłysz poprawną wymowę i odtwarzaj słowa i teksty z poprawnym akcentem.

Tekst na mowę
Skorzystaj z funkcji TTS, która pomoże Ci nauczyć się brzmienia słów oraz transkrypcji fonetycznej.

Tłumaczenia całostronicowe
Przetłumacz całe strony internetowe na wybrany język za pomocą jednego kliknięcia. Jest to nowa funkcja udostępniana bezpłatnie przez Tłumacza Google, którą zintegrowaliśmy z naszym tłumaczem.

Jeśli masz włączony mikrofon, możesz mówić tekst, który chcesz przetłumaczyć, co wydaje się całkiem wygodne, jeśli nas o to poprosisz.

Translate Translator umożliwia podróżnym, studentom, biznesmenom, pracodawcom i personelowi medycznemu czytanie, pisanie i mówienie w wybranych językach oraz tłumaczenie w dowolnym miejscu na świecie.

• Tłumacz tekstu: Uzyskaj bezpłatne tłumaczenie tekstu w ponad 100 językach.
• Przetłumacz tekst na mowę: Słuchaj tłumaczenia głosami męskimi lub żeńskimi.
• Podczas tłumaczenia przełączaj się między różnymi dialektami.
• Słownik i tezaurus dla wszystkich języków.
• Transliteracja, udostępnianie, ulubione, historia i wiele więcej.
• Tłumacz zdjęć: dzięki Tłumaczowi możesz używać aparatu do natychmiastowego tłumaczenia menu, znaków i nie tylko.
• Tłumaczenie offline: Tłumacz w ponad 40 językach bez połączenia z Internetem.
• Tłumacz głosowy: Przetłumacz rozmowę głosową i mowę.
• Koniugacje czasowników w różnych czasach.
Po prostu wybierz tłumacza, którego chcesz dziś użyć: uLanguage translate lub Google translate.

Skorzystaj z tłumacza podczas podróży w 2023 roku:
- przetłumacz tekst i głos w kilka sekund

- tłumaczyć rozmowy w sklepach,
- tłumaczyć znaki i wskazówki.

Microsoft Translator to bezpłatna, osobista aplikacja do tłumaczenia na ponad 70 języków, służąca do tłumaczenia tekstu, głosu, rozmów, zdjęć z aparatu i zrzutów ekranu. Możesz także bezpłatnie pobrać języki do tłumaczenia offline i używać ich podczas podróży.
